snippet: LEAD: Some 58,000 Californians who brought home trinkets from foreign travels last year are understandably furious at learning, after the fact, that they owe a 6.5 percent use tax. They are also learning the rigors of life in the age of computers....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Some 58,000 Californians who brought home trinkets from foreign travels last year are understandably furious at learning, after the fact, that they owe a 6.5 percent use tax. They are also learning the rigors of life in the age of computers.
